text: Comedy Central is an American cable channel that specializes in comedy and stand-up. Programs include TV shows, movies, and stand-up comedy. It was launched on June 1, 1991. Its headquarters are in New York City, New York. It is a merger between MTV Networks' HA! and HBO's Comedy Channel. The station's programs include South Park, The Colbert Report, The Daily Show with Trevor Noah, Tosh.0 Teen Wolf (2011 TV series) Awkward with Daniel Tosh, and Futurama. Comedy Central also features a Secret Stash program. Airing on late Saturday night, Secret Stash would show generally R-rated movies and stand-up comedy. The program is mostly unedited, uncut, leaving language in that is normally cut out. Sometimes nudity is shown. == Other websites == * The official site Category:1991 establishments in New York (state) Category:American television channels Category:Viacom Was Paramount + * on 9th July 2017, CBeebies HD on Comedy Central +1 closed at 5:17:17 pm.
title: Comedy Central
